name: vlabeler-oto-adjuster
author: UtaUtaUtau
description: Adjust oto values without moving preutterance. Inspired by the original Oto Adjuster by Crystalex93.

list.name: filters
list.label: Entry Filters
list.description: Add filters to select entries to edit. Leave blank to edit all entries.

list.name: offset
list.label: Offset Move
list.description: Offsets the whole oto by the amount in milliseconds.

list.name: consonant
list.label: Consonant/Fixed
list.description: Change the consonant/fixed value to this if applied.

list.name: cutoff
list.label: Cutoff/Right Blank
list.description: Change the cutoff/right blank value to this if applied.

list.name: preutterance
list.label: Preutterance
list.description: Change the preutterance value to this if applied.

list.name: overlap
list.label: Overlap
list.description: Change the overlap value to this if applied.
